attributes.action: Petition US for proper Beiber trial.
attributes.additional_details:
To force the British Government to petition the United States Government to ensure Justin Beiber is fully held to account for his driving under the influence of alcohol and drugs offence. Per Florida law first time offenders can expect fines, licence revoke, and 6-9 months in jail.
Justin Beibers fame and media/fan pressure should in no way promote leniency.
